snippet.title: Suikoden I & II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars - Exclusive Neclord Boss Gameplay
snippet.description:
Watch almost four minutes of exclusive gameplay from the upcoming Suikoden 2 HD remaster, showing off a tense boss battle with Neclord. Join the hero and his allies Kahn, Victor, Eilie, Nanami, and Rikimaru as they take on the formidable foe.
 
Classic RPG franchise, Suikoden, will return in 2023 with the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars. Announced by Konami at TGS 2022, the games will feature a variety of improvements and quality-of-life features, including auto-battle, double-speed battle, enhanced pixel sprites and environment art, HD character portraits, new sound effects, and more.
 
Suikoden 1 & 2 HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars is coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC via Steam, and Nintendo Switch in 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #Suikoden
